Issue.creator: nnao
Issue.summary: Typo in warning messages at configtxgen
Issue.description: specifications) in the warning message at common/tools/configtxgen/encoder/encoder.go L143: {code} if len(conf.Policies) == 0 { logger.Warningf("Default policy emission is deprecated, please include policy specificiations for the channel group in configtx.yaml") addImplicitMetaPolicyDefaults(channelGroup) {code} Also L193, L255, L274 and L312 have same typo. >
